name: Time Hero (Fedron, Nek0pi, Eeveeboo)
description:
You play as a young hero who has a unique ability of rewinding back in time to avoid death.

Shoot your way through the dungeon and get as far as you can, but be careful for time can shatter around you and you may end up somewhere you don't want to be.

  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to aim
  • Left click to shoot

Programming done by @Fedron and @nek0pi

Art and Sound done by @Eeveeboo
